amendment.description: To designate the week of September 20 through September 26, 2020, as "Gold Star Families Remembrance Week".

vote.text: Amendment SA 1881 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1881 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4185) To designate the week of September 20 through September 26, 2020, as "Gold Star Families Remembrance Week".
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1881 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Hyde-Smith to Amendment SA 2301.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1881 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
